query.prompt:

1 Io dico, seguitando, ch’assai prima 2 che noi fossimo al piè de l’alta torre, 3 li occhi nostri n’andar suso a la cima
4 per due fiammette che i vedemmo porre, 5 e un’altra da lungi render cenno, 6 tanto ch’a pena il potea l’occhio tòrre.
query.result:
1 I say, continuing, that very early 2 that we were at the foot of the high tower, 3 our eyes went up to the summit
4 by two little flames that we saw set, 5 and another from afar made a sign, 6 so much that the eye could barely turn.
